text:
[Verse]
Raindrops on my face
Feel the cool embrace
Twirl around the street
Dancing to the beat

[Verse 2]
Puddles on the ground
We don't hear a sound
Splashing like a child
Feeling so alive

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Wash away the pain
Every drop a song
Where we both belong

[Verse 3]
Clouds begin to break
Morning starts to wake
But we're still in sync
With each drop of ink

[Bridge]
Hold on tight to me
In this fantasy
Let the waters fall
We can have it all

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Wash away the pain
Every drop a song
Where we both belong
title: Dancing in the Rain
